```{python}
#| label: disease-burden-war-curing-comparison
#| fig-cap: "The $119T Death Toilet"

import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path

# Add project root to path (find it relative to current working directory)
project_root = Path.cwd()
if project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health':    
    while project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health' and project_root.parent != project_root:
        project_root = project_root.parent
sys.path.insert(0, str(project_root))

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from brain.figures._chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark, clean_spines,
    COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_WHITE, PATTERN_DIAGONAL, PATTERN_HORIZONTAL
)

# Setup styling
setup_chart_style(style='light', dpi=150)

# Data
categories = ['Disease\nBurden', 'War &\nConflict', 'Finding\nCures']
amounts = [109.1, 9.7, 0.068]
colors_budget = [COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_WHITE]  # Use solid black and white

# Create chart
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(18, 10))
bars = ax.bar(categories, amounts, color=colors_budget, width=0.6,
              edgecolor=COLOR_BLACK, linewidth=2)

# Apply pattern to the third bar (Finding Cures)
bars[2].set_hatch(PATTERN_DIAGONAL)

# Add labels directly on/above bars with descriptions
labels_with_desc = [
    ('$109T', 'Disease\nBurden'),
    ('$10T', 'War &\nConflict'),
    ('$68B', 'Finding\nCures')
]

for i, (bar, (amount_label, desc)) in enumerate(zip(bars, labels_with_desc)):
    height = bar.get_height()
    if amounts[i] >= 50:  # Only very large bars (>$50T) get label inside
        ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height * 0.5, f'{amount_label}\n{desc}',
                ha='center', va='center', fontsize=60, weight='bold', color=COLOR_WHITE, linespacing=1.2)
    else:  # Smaller bars - label above in black
        ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height + 3, f'{amount_label}\n{desc}',
                ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=48, weight='bold', color=COLOR_BLACK, linespacing=1.2)

# Remove all axis labels and ticks (all columns are labeled with amounts)
ax.set_xticks([])
ax.set_xticklabels([])
ax.set_yticks([])
ax.set_yticklabels([])

ax.set_ylim(0, 120)

# Remove all spines for ultra-clean look
clean_spines(ax, ['top', 'right', 'left', 'bottom'])

# Add branding
add_watermark(fig)

#plt.tight_layout()  # Disabled - using rcParams margins instead 

# Save in brain/figures directory
output_dir = project_root / 'brain' / 'figures'
output_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
plt.savefig(output_dir / 'disease-burden-war-curing-comparison.png', dpi=200, bbox_inches=None, facecolor=COLOR_WHITE)
plt.show()
```
